text: @PresidencyZA Lifting the lockdow will increase the rate of COVID19 infections in townships. The poor will be in trouble since they can only afford public hospitals which might in turn be overwhelmed by the overcrowded hospitals. At the same time, the poor are hungry...catch 22 situation🤔
